name: JarlSlice
description:
jump, run, slice ! fast paced parkour game with puzzle elements.

Play over 30 levels with different unique tools and mechanics .

Collect funny looking cubes !

JarSlice is a sequel to my game Jarlson ! With way more levels , sound,  cool new mechanics, less scuffed water, slicing! , more graphic and game settings, an actual full game mode instead of just levels , unlocking , collectables
and my favorite -> more fun .

Default Controls:
ESC - pause menu
R - reset
W,A,S,D - move
SPACEBAR - Jump
SHIFT - Slide/Crouch
E - Interact
Q - Drop
MOUSE0 - Grab
MOUSE1 - Tool main action
MOUSE2 - Tool alternative action

All Keybinds (except ESC) can be changed ingame !
